ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Played a little last night.
ygData.msgSnippet: I did it 9 hours ago and it worked fine.  Charmed two cyclopses into fighting each other, when one got low I chained the winning one (to separate them), ran
ygData.messageBody:
I did it 9 hours ago and it worked fine. Charmed two
cyclopses into fighting each other, when one got low I chained
the winning one (to separate them), ran away, charmed the very
low one, and had my friends kill it. They got the kill.

By the way, Ocylus Ogrefiend at 75% hp requres 3 HGs and 4
cyclopses to kill. :)

On Sat, 11 Mar 2000, Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) wrote:
>
> nothing works the same with Harmonic. charming doesn't clear damage list,
> save resistances don't work against dragons. it's a whole different world.
>
> JUST KIDDING! ALL CAPS! ;)
>
> dunno Harm, i have been doing it for my wife's cleric the last month to
> great effect.
>
> Shada Powa, L50 Wood Elf Bard
> Tyria Sarkin, L46 High Elf Wizard
> <Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server
>
